text: Tarik Carson da Silva (Rivera, Uruguay, 23 August 1946 - Argentina, 29 September 2014) was a Uruguayan-born writer and painter, active in Argentina. == Work == === Novels === * Una pequeña soledad (Filofalsía, Buenos Aires, 1986) * El estado superior de la materia (Buenos Aires, 1989) * Ganadores (Proyección, Montevideo, 1991) * Océanos de néctar (Axxón, Buenos Aires, 1992) === Short stories === * El hombre olvidado (Géminis, Montevideo, 1973) * El corazón reversible (Monte Sexto, Montevideo, 1986) ==References== Category:Uruguayan painters Category:Uruguayan science fiction writers Category:Argentine science fiction writers Category:1946 births Category:2014 deaths
title: Tarik Carson
